item.title: About Darko Labs
item.description: Design Philosophy DarkoLabs embraces the constraints of monospace typography to create a unique, retro-futuristic aesthetic. Our design philosophy is built on the following principles: Embrace the Grid: Every character occupies the same space, creating a natural grid that guides our layouts. Simplicity in Complexity: Use basic elements to create complex designs. Function Informs Form: Let the content drive the design choices. Digital Nostalgia: Evoke the feeling of early computer interfaces while pushing the boundaries of modern web design.

item.title: Darko Labs Not Tetris
item.description: The week that Claude 3.5 was released and it introduced the artifacts feature, I built a web based version of tetris while waiting for someone to call me back. You can play the working version here.. ┌────────────────┐ │ ▓▓ │ │ ▓▓▓▓ │ │ ▓▓ │ │ │ │ ░░ │ │ ░░░░ │ │ │ │ ██ │ │ ██ │ │ │ │ ▒▒ │ │ ▒▒▒▒ │ │ │ │ ░░░░ ▓▓▓▓ ████ │ │ ░░░░ ▓▓▓▓ ████ │ └────────────────┘ SCORE 0 HIGH 0 ←→ ↑ ↓

item.title: Darko Labs Term Surrounder
item.description: Term Surrounder Easily surround each line of your search terms with quotes. Perfect for preparing precise search queries. Paste your terms (one per line), click to add quotes, and copy the result. All processing happens in your browser - no data is transferred. Surround with Quotes Copy to Clipboard
